page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Employment patterns within the block are many and varried.Because of the rural nature of the area many people are employed in{agriculture } and its servicing. But because of rural depopulation, intesification of farming methods and the buying of property by outsiders who probably commute to{Shrewsbury}or other nearby towns, employment prospects for the locals are rather poor.
The small ribbon development at{ {Upper Battlefield,}consisting of some 18 or so mainly detatched 'between the wars' houses, are occupied either by retired people or early middle aged high salary earners who travel some distance to{banks}and{offices.
